parameters.name: NewAssumeRolePolicyDocument
parameters.description: The document of the policy that specifies the trusted entity to assume the RAM role.

parameters.name: NewDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the RAM role.

The description must be 1 to 1,024 characters in length.

parameters.name: NewMaxSessionDuration
parameters.description:
The maximum session duration of the RAM role.

Unit: seconds. Valid values: 3600 to 43200. Default value: 3600.

If you do not specify this parameter, the default value is used.

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description:
The name of the RAM role.

The name must be 1 to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.),and hyphens (-).
